definition: having a day or month inserted to make the calendar year correspond to the solar year: 'Feb. 29 is an intercalary day'
details:
adjective
- having a day or month inserted to make the calendar year correspond to the solar year: 'Feb. 29 is an intercalary day'
= example: having a day or month inserted to make the calendar year correspond to the solar year: 'Feb. 29 is an intercalary day'
